en: A bargain is a bargain.
A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush.
ja: 今日の百より明日の五十

en: A cat has nine lives.
A friend in need is a friend in deed.
ja: 困ったときの友こそ真の友

en: A little learning is a dangerous thing.
A rolling stone gathers no moss.
"A stitch in time saves nine,"
ja: 今日の一針、明日の十針

en: A watched pot never boils.
Accidents will happen.
All roads lead to Rome.
ja: すべての道はローマに通ず

en: All that glitters is not gold.
ja: 光るもの必ずしも金ならず

en: All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy.
All's well that ends well.
ja: 終わりよければすべてよし

en: An apple a day keeps the doctor away.
ja: １日につき、りんご１個で医者要らず

en: "An eye for an eye, and a tooth for a tooth."
ja: 目には目を。歯には歯を

en: Anything is better than nothing.
ja: 枯れ木も山のにぎわい

en: As well be hanged for a sheep as a lamb.
Bad news travels fast.
Beauty is only skin deep.
Better late than never
ja: 遅くともしないよりはまし

en: Birds of a feather flock together.
Blood is thicker than water.
Boys will be boys.
ja: 男の子はやっぱり男の子

en: Business before pleasure.
ja: 遊ぶのはまず仕事をしてから

en: Call a spade a spade.
Charity begins at home.
Clothes make the man.
Constant dripping wears away a stone.
Curiosity killed the cat.
Dead men tell no tales.
Do not put new wine into old bottles.
ja: 新しい葡萄酒は古い皮袋に入れてはならない。

en: Do not throw pearls to swine.
Don't count your chickens before they are hatched.
Don't cross the bridge until you come to it.
Don't make a mountain out of a molehill.
Don't put off till tomorrow what you can do today.
ja: 今日できることは明日に延ばすな。

en: Easier said than done.
ja: 言うは易く、行いは難し。

en: "Easy come, easy go.　"
ja: あぶく銭は身に付かず。

en: Even Homer sometimes nods.
ja: 弘法にも筆のあやまり

en: Everything comes to him who waits.
ja: 待てば海路の日和あり。

en: Fact is stranger than fiction.
ja: 事実は小説より奇なり。

en: Faint heart never won fair lady.
"First come, first served."
Fools rush in where angels fear to tread.
ja: 飛んで火に入る夏の虫。

en: Forgive and forget.
"Give him an inch, and he'll take a mile."
ja: 庇（ひさし）を貸して母屋を取られる

en: Haste makes waste.
ja: 急いてはことを仕損じる

en: He who laughs last laughs longest.
ja: 最後に笑うものが一番よく笑う。

en: History repeats itself.
Honesty is the best policy.
Hungry is the best sauce.
ja: 空き腹にまずいものなし

en: Ignorance is bliss.
It is an ill wind that blows nobody good.
ja: 泣く者もあれば笑うものもある

en: It is no use crying over spilt milk.
It never rains but it pours.
"Jack of all trades, master of none."
Kill two birds with one stone.
Knowledge is power.
Last but not least.
Laughter is the best medicine.
Less is more.
ja: 過ぎたるは及ばざるがごとし。

en: Let sleeping dogs lie.
"Like father, like son."
ja: この父にしてこの子あり。

en: Look before you leap.
Love is blind.
"Love me, love my dog."
ja: 坊主憎くけりゃ袈裟まで憎い。

en: Make hay while the sun shines.
Man shall not live by bread alone.
ja: 人はパンのみにて生きるにあらず。

en: Many a true word is spoken in jest.
Might makes right.
ja: 無理が通れば道理が引っ込む。

en: Money makes the mare to go.
Money talks.
Necessity is the mother of invention.
Never put off till tomorrow what you can do today.
ja: 今日出来ることを明日まで延ばすな

en: No man can serve two masters.
ja: 夫婦げんかは犬も食わない

en: No news is good news.
ja: 便りのないのはよい便り

en: "No pain, no gain."
Nothing ventured nothing gained.
ja: 虎穴に入らずんば、虎児を得ず

en: One good turn deserves another.
ja: 情けは人のためならず。

en: One is never too old to learn.
One man's meat is another man's poison.
One may (or might) as well hanged for a sheep as ( for) a lamb.
"Out of sight,out of mind."
"Out of the frying pan, into the fire."
People will talk.
ja: 人の口に戸は立てられぬ

en: "Physician, heal yourself."
Practice makes perfect.
Practice what you preach.
ja: 論語読みの論語知らず

en: Pride goes before a fall.
ja: おごれるものは久しからず

en: Rome was not built in a day.
ja: ローマは一日にしてならず

en: Saying is one thing and doing another.
ja: 言うは易く行うは難し

en: Scratch my back and I will scratch yours.
Seeing is believing.
Silence is golden.
Slow and steady wins the race.
"So many men, so many minds."
Spare the rod and spoil the child.
ja: かわいい子には旅をさせろ

en: "Speak of the devil, and he'll appear."
Speech is silver; silence is golden.
Still waters run deep.
Strike while the iron is hot.
Talk is cheap.
ja: 言うは易く行うは難し

en: The darkest hour is before the dawn.
The die is cast.
The early birds catches the worm.
The end justifies the means.
The eyeｓ are the window of the soul.
The father's sins are visited on the children.
The husband is always the last to know.
ja: 知らぬは亭主ばかりなり。

en: The Lord helps those who help themselves.
ja: 天は自ら助くる者を助く

en: The pen is mightier than the sword.
The pot calls kettle black.
The proof of the pudding is in the eating.
"The sooner, the better."
The tree is known by its fruit.
The walls have ears.
There is always a next time.
There is no accounting for tastes.
ja: 蓼（たで）食う虫も好きずき

en: There is no place like home.
There is no royal road to learning.
There is no smoke without fire.
ja: 火のないところに煙はたたぬ

en: There is nothing new under the sun.
ja: この世に全く新しきものなし

en: Those who live in glass houses should not throw stones.
ja: すねに傷持つ身で他人の批評などせぬがよい

en: Those whom the gods love die young.
Time and tide wait for no man.
Time is money.
"To err is human,to forgive divine."
ja: 過ちは人の常、許すのは神の業

en: To lock the barn when the horse is stolen.
ja: 盗人を捕らえて縄をなう。

en: To try the patience of a saint.
To wash one's hands of a thing.
Tomorrow is another day.
ja: 明日は明日の風が吹く

en: Too many cooks spoil the broth.
ja: 船頭多くして、船、山に登る

en: Two ｈeads are better than one.
ja: 三人寄れば文殊の知恵

en: Variety is the spice of life.
Virtue is its own reward.
ja: 善行の報いはその中にあり

en: We cannot see the forest for the trees.
What is worth doing at all is worth doing well.
ja: 卑しくも価値のあることなら立派にやるだけの価値がある

en: When in Rome do as the Romans do.
ja: 郷に入りては郷に従え。

en: "When the cat's away, the mice will play."
"Where there is a will, there is a way."
ja: 精神一到何事かならざらん

en: "Where there is life, there is hope."
"Where there is smoke, there is fire.　"
ja: 火のないところに煙は立たず。

en: You cannot get blood out of a stone.
ja: 冷酷な人間から、同情は得られない

en: You cannot make an omelet without breaking eggs.
ja: 犠牲なしに収穫はない

en: You can't teach an old dog new tricks.
ja: 歳はとるもんじゃないね

en: You have to draw the line somewhere.
You have to start somewhere.
You reap what you sow.
You scratch my back and I'll scratch yours.
You'll never know unless you try.
